Class Database

java.lang.Object
Database
public class Database extends Object
This class function as a class to all methods etc that interact with the database

    • newInfoToData

      public static void newInfoToData(Customer customer, Architect architect, Contracter contracter, Building building) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method serves the purpose of adding all the new data which is inputted by the user into tables into the mysql server.
      Parameters:
      customer - this is a customer object
      architect - this is an architect object
      contracter - this is a contracter object
      building - this is a building object
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is there for if there is any error with connecting to the server etc
      ClassNotFoundException

    • printAllFromCustomer

      public static void printAllFromCustomer(Statement statement, String type, String choice) throws SQLException
      This Method functions as way to print information from any tables in the database if needed.
      Parameters:
      statement - , This parameter is to put in the statement object to implement sql commands.
      type - , This parameter functions as to be there to state what type of tables you want in terms of all the tables that describe the persons.
      choice - , This is to choose which type of tables you want for example like a person or deadline_complete etc
      Throws:
      SQLException
